attributes.action: lead by example and stop wasting taxpayer pounds on hairbrained schemes and setting targets for anybody and everybody who is a public service employee.  Most of all stop wasting taxpayer pounds on totally unjustified second home allowances for the group of public service employees known as Members of Parliament.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our corrupt government is the world's best example (second to the EU commission, that is) of waste of taxpayer contributions.  More time and money is spent on party political manouvreing among our government than anywhere else on the planet.  All in the name of 'Keep The Scottish Pretender in Power'.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
